mapper.insert:
select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 as seq from test1
insert into test1 ( seq, test ) values ( #{seq}, #{test} )

select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 as seq from test2
insert into test2 ( seq, test ) values ( #{seq}, #{test} )

select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 as seq from test3
insert into test3 ( seq, test ) values ( #{seq}, #{test} )
